channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: With Trump's Middle East Buildup, Think Desert Fox—Not Desert Storm
item.description: The United States appears poised to attack Iran just eight months after Operation Midnight Hammer. While U.S. military presence in the Middle East is at its highest level since five carrier battle groups assembled at the outset of the 2003 invasion of Iraq, itlacks the size and capabilities needed for major combat operations or regime change.
